definition: shaking one to the core (idiom); extremely disturbing/shattering/hair-raising
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
soul/mortal soul, i.e. attached to the body
to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm

sentences.english: Or as your tear drop while deeply attached, dripping on my cheek, startling my soul, touching my heart .
sentences.chinese: 或如繾綣時你的那顆淚，滴在我的臉頰，動魄驚心。
